articles.author: Stephanie Pappas
articles.title: A Double Solar Flare Just Triggered Radio Blackouts Over Asia And Australia - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The restless sunspot is disrupting radio communications.
articles.content:
A restless sunspot threw off a double solar flare Monday (April 25), triggering some radio blackouts over Asia and Australia. 
The sunspot AR2993 erupted with two M1 flares in quick succession, acco… [+2539 chars]

articles.title: NTU launches centre to study how dementia develops in Asians - The Straits Times
articles.description:
It will study the changes in the brains of Asians before dementia sets in and find new strategies that can  predict and delay its progression.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - The Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine at Nanyang Technological University has launched a centre to study the changes in the brains of Asians before dementia sets in as well as find new st… [+2405 chars]
